lead_paragraph: The troubled preparations for the Rio Olympics proved that the model for the Games could withstand the toughest challenges but the IOC hoped it would not have to face such a stress test again, president Thomas Bach said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Rio Games Preparation Chaos Hopefully a One-Off Event : IOC
headline.main: Rio Games Preparation Chaos Hopefully a One-Off Event : IOC
